title: UI 検査 テーブル 構成
description: プロ 版の 検査 テーブル 構成

dcmuiTableConfigUsername.title: Username
dcmuiTableConfigUsername.description: Username to which this set should be available

dcmuiTableConfigRoles.title: Role
dcmuiTableConfigRoles.description: Username role that can use this Set ( If you set the username, the role will be ignored )

dcmuiTableID.title: Table ID
dcmuiTableID.description: The ID of the Table in the UI for which the config should be effective

dcmuiTableConfigIsDefault.title: Is Default
dcmuiTableConfigIsDefault.description: Set this Column-Set to the default one. (Make sure that only one of the Set - siblings child is set to default).
